hymn.title: See the Conqu'ror mount in triumph

layout.singingstanza: See the Con -- qu'ror mount in tri -- umph, See the King in ro -- yal state Ri -- ding on the clouds His cha -- riot To His heav'n -- ly pa -- lace gate; Hark! The choirs of an -- gel voi -- ces Joy -- ful hal -- le -- lu -- jahs sing, And the por -- tals high are lift -- ed To re -- ceive, to re -- ceive, to re -- ceive their heav'n -- ly King.

lyrics.stanza: See the Conqu'ror mount in triumph, See the King in royal state Riding on the clouds His chariot To His heav'nly palace gate; Hark! The choirs of angel voices Joyful hallelujahs sing, And the portals high are lifted To receive, to receive, to receive their heav'nly King.

Who is this that comes in glory, With the trump of jubilee? Lord of battles, God of armies, He has gained the victory; He who on the cross did suffer, He who from the grave arose, He has vanquished sin and Satan, He by death, He by death, He by death has spoiled His foes.

While He lifts His hands in blessing He is parted from His friends; While their eager eyes behold Him, He upon the clouds ascends; He who walked with God and pleased Him, Preaching truth and doom to come, He, our Enoch, is translated To His home, to His home, to His everlasting home.
